Articles.Content:
[00:00:58] TT-70 Radial Decoupler collided into RE-M3 "Mainsail" Liquid Fuel Engine.

Ok, it didn't stage quite cleanly but the previous three launches of the same bird didn't, either, no harm done.

[00:01:01] RealChute Cone Chute collided into SpaceY S109 Heavy Lift SRB.

Huh?  The chute was attached to the SRB, how could it collide with it?  And this is three seconds after it came off the rocket, it should be tumbling away, not hitting anything.

The chute was somehow lost although F3 doesn't give an indication of why.

This is the exact same rocket I just launched, on the exact same profile in MechJeb.  Why did this one punch a crater in the ground?  (The SRB was supposed to be recovered.)  The only thing I can think of is that launch #3 was reverted after I burned for Minmus and the noticed MechJeb had routed me through Mun.
